being a good listener is one of the most

anyone can have yet few of us know how

it's hard to know our own minds often

to go into greater detail to push just a

rather than launch forth on their own

urges

better
way thirdly good listeners don't

they're skilled at making occasional
little positive sounds strategic M that

they give the impression that they

rather than a rep ped
by lastly good listeners separate

and in need of some gentle
